ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Need some opinions
ygData.msgSnippet: I think you d be fine coming back now. Apparently quite a few ppl got this game for Christmas because I ve been seeing lots of true newbies for the first
ygData.messageBody:
I think you'd be fine coming back now. Apparently quite a few ppl got this game for Christmas because I've been seeing lots of "true newbies" for the first time in a long time. Also, I got a RL friend of mine playing just last week. You could group with her, hehe.

A lot has changed in the game, I think you'd like it. Lower lvls are much easier to get through now.

 "Yagermeister <odd_yager@...>" <odd_yager@...> wrote:

Hey everyone,

I need some help on my next MPORPG purchase. I played EQ since Beta
and quit about 2 and half years ago (college took priority heh) and
now that I have secured a somewhat stable career, I'm planning to hit
online RPGing again. Question is, being that EQ has been out for 5
years, is it too late to come back and start anew? Meaning am I going
to look ridiculous (prolly will regardless) being the only lvl 6 guy
on the server in cloth and using fine steel? Or should I look for
another MRORPG game? How is Camelot? Or Neverwinter Nights?

Regards,

Yager
